update tp_goods
cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
extend_cat_id = #{extendCatId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_sn = #{goodsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
click_count = #{clickCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
store_count = #{storeCount,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
market_price = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
shop_price = #{shopPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_remark = #{goodsRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
original_img = #{originalImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_real = #{isReal,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_on_sale = #{isOnSale,jdbcType=BIT},
is_free_shipping = #{isFreeShipping,jdbcType=BIT},
on_time = #{onTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
is_recommend = #{isRecommend,jdbcType=BIT},
is_new = #{isNew,jdbcType=BIT},
is_hot = #{isHot,jdbcType=BIT},
last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
spec_type = #{specType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
give_integral = #{giveIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER},
exchange_integral = #{exchangeIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER},
suppliers_id = #{suppliersId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
sales_sum = #{salesSum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
prom_type = #{promType,jdbcType=BIT},
prom_id = #{promId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
commission = #{commission,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
spu = #{spu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shipping_area_ids = #{shippingAreaIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_content = #{goodsContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tp_goods set cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, extend_cat_id = #{extendCatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_sn = #{goodsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, click_count = #{clickCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, store_count = #{storeCount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, market_price = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shop_price = #{shopPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_remark = #{goodsRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, original_img = #{originalImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_real = #{isReal,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_on_sale = #{isOnSale,jdbcType=BIT}, is_free_shipping = #{isFreeShipping,jdbcType=BIT}, on_time = #{onTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, is_recommend = #{isRecommend,jdbcType=BIT}, is_new = #{isNew,jdbcType=BIT}, is_hot = #{isHot,jdbcType=BIT}, last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, spec_type = #{specType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, give_integral = #{giveIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, exchange_integral = #{exchangeIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, suppliers_id = #{suppliersId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, sales_sum = #{salesSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prom_type = #{promType,jdbcType=BIT}, prom_id = #{promId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commission = #{commission,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, spu = #{spu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipping_area_ids = #{shippingAreaIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_content = #{goodsContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tp_goods set cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, extend_cat_id = #{extendCatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_sn = #{goodsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, click_count = #{clickCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, store_count = #{storeCount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, market_price = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shop_price = #{shopPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_remark = #{goodsRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, original_img = #{originalImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_real = #{isReal,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_on_sale = #{isOnSale,jdbcType=BIT}, is_free_shipping = #{isFreeShipping,jdbcType=BIT}, on_time = #{onTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, is_recommend = #{isRecommend,jdbcType=BIT}, is_new = #{isNew,jdbcType=BIT}, is_hot = #{isHot,jdbcType=BIT}, last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, spec_type = #{specType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, give_integral = #{giveIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, exchange_integral = #{exchangeIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, suppliers_id = #{suppliersId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, sales_sum = #{salesSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prom_type = #{promType,jdbcType=BIT}, prom_id = #{promId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commission = #{commission,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, spu = #{spu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipping_area_ids = #{shippingAreaIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
,
from tp_goods order by sort

select g.goods_id, g.cat_id, g.extend_cat_id, g.goods_sn, g.goods_name, g.click_count, g.brand_id, g.store_count, g.comment_count, g.weight, g.market_price, g.shop_price, g.cost_price, g.keywords, g.goods_remark, g.original_img, g.is_real, g.is_on_sale, g.is_free_shipping, g.on_time, g.sort, g.is_recommend, g.is_new, g.is_hot, g.last_update, g.goods_type, g.spec_type, g.give_integral, g.exchange_integral, g.suppliers_id, g.sales_sum, g.prom_type, g.prom_id, g.commission, g.spu, g.sku, g.shipping_area_ids, g.goods_content,gc.name catName,gc.parent_id_path catParentIdPath from tp_goods g LEFT join tp_goods_category gc on g.cat_id=gc.id where 1=1
and g.cat_id in
#{item}
AND (g.goods_name like concat('%', #{keywords}, '%') or g.keywords like concat('%', #{keywords}, '%') )

select g.goods_id, g.cat_id, g.extend_cat_id, g.goods_sn, g.goods_name, g.click_count, g.brand_id, g.store_count, g.comment_count, g.weight, g.market_price, g.shop_price, g.cost_price, g.keywords, g.goods_remark, g.original_img, g.is_real, g.is_on_sale, g.is_free_shipping, g.on_time, g.sort, g.is_recommend, g.is_new, g.is_hot, g.last_update, g.goods_type, g.spec_type, g.give_integral, g.exchange_integral, g.suppliers_id, g.sales_sum, g.prom_type, g.prom_id, g.commission, g.spu, g.sku, g.shipping_area_ids, g.goods_content,gc.name catName,gc.parent_id_path catParentIdPath,
from tp_goods g LEFT join tp_goods_category gc on g.cat_id=gc.id where g.goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
